q: Colin Powell 's endorsement is significant due to the fact that John McCain has repeatedly singled him out for lavish praise. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
